website_summaries.verdict: Endorsed by many medical professionals, this lumbar stretching device from Chisoft is truly like having a chiropractor in a bag. Affordable alternative to professional grade models.
cons: Triggers back spasms in some users

customer_reviews.title: Wow! 😃
customer_reviews.text: Wow! It really does work. My brother-in-law told me about this & I thought "what the hell, I'll give it a try for my persistent lower back pain... And it really works! I'm only doing 10 minutes a day on the lowest setting & have had no back pain, except when I over-do it physically. But, even then, the pain is very mild & my back recovers quickly. I really am impressed & thankful for this little back stretcher.
customer_reviews.author: K. Irvine

customer_reviews.title: A Surprising Help
customer_reviews.text: Ive been going to the chiropractor for many years three times a week. I hurt my back many years ago as a child and have suffered on and off for years (I'm 67). I always felt better after treatment on a table that stretched my lumbar by arching it. WhenI found this stretcher on Amazon I wasn'T sure it would work but what a surprise------it does. I use it 5 minutes a day and feel much better I still go to the chiropractor but only twice a month to maintain.
customer_reviews.author: emaxx

customer_reviews.title: Saves me a copay
customer_reviews.text: I work at a PC all day and this device has brought me great relief. I lay on it as soon as I get home everyday. It's always a bit uncomfortable at first as it stretches my back and gets it to slowly relax. I admit, I sometimes spend 10 minutes on it just because it makes my back feel so much better. The little knobby things on it are not so bad as long as I stay clothed. I wouldn't lay on this thing without a shirt. All in all, I'm happy with it and it saves me a weekly chiropractor copay.
customer_reviews.author: D. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Relief

Also the things that look like bumps are actually very pointy and sharp. I found it uncomfortable and put a towel over it to lay on it.

The ease of being able to roll off when finished was a major reason we chose this unit. Recommended.

customer_reviews.title: Helpful little device!
customer_reviews.text: Very helpful little device to relieve back pain. I use it mostly when doing housework, like vacuuming, mopping floor, cleaning bathrooms... my back starts hurting about 30 min after I start that kind of housework and I have found that taking 5 min breaks to lie down with this back stretcher makes a huge difference! It relaxes my back and I'm able to resume cleaning with little or no back pain. I usually clean for about 30-45 min and then spend 5 min or so laying on the back stretcher. Works great!
